value:
Multiplex network of 3 edge types representing relationships (advice, friendship, and “reports to”) between managers of a high-tech company.  Data hosted by Manlio De Domenico.[^icon]
[^icon]: Description obtained from the [ICON](https://icon.colorado.edu) project.
